paragraph.heading: 2Help Projects
paragraph.paragraph: The document tool can produce help projects for:
paragraph.heading: 3Creating Help
paragraph.paragraph:
Creating a help system is easy. Once you have
../toc/index.xml created a table of contents to provide the physical navigation structure of the help you are ready to begin....

list.item: Choose if you wish to convert your documents to HTML, or to a full help project. Converting to just HTML does not require a table contents and will simply convert all your document to HTML.
Select a filter if appropriate. The document content will be filtered for the filter you specify, otherwise they will be unfiltered
Choose an output location fot the converted files and help project files.
Choose a name for the help project
Choose the type of help you wish to create

Select the table of contents which contains the navigation structure you need for this help project. Note, if you selected to generatet a web based help project above you can select multiple table of contents. Output will be created for each chosen toc according to the filter you specify for each one.
Thsi step only applies if you chose to create a web based help project. Select the which filters should be associated with which toc.
Click OK. The project will be created along with all the files necessary.
